text: Movers & Shakers is a 1985 American comedy movie directed by William Asher and starring Walter Matthau, Charles Grodin (who also worte), Vincent Gardenia, Tyne Daly, Gilda Radner, Steve Martin, Bill Macy. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by William Asher
title: Movers & Shakers
